programme.title: Looking for musical chemistry
programme.desc: S1 E1 – Songwriters get randomly paired up with producers as they work together to create an original track.

programme.desc: S2 E4 – The top teams of songwriters and producers have one more challenge before winning a publishing deal.

programme.title: No I in team
programme.desc: A devastating mistake by the Trek Factory Racing support crew threatens to derail Evie Richards’s comeback.

programme.desc: In the downhill, Finn Iles struggles to beat his biggest competitor, team-mate Loïc Bruni.

programme.desc: A wave of younger, faster competitors force 'old dogs to learn new tricks' to stay in the results sheet.

programme.desc: As Rachel Atherton returns to MTB racing, she works to find a balance while Vali Höll prepares for success.

programme.title: Barefoot Charles
programme.desc: Barefoot Charles Albert is a minimalist who climbs boulders in Fontainebleau, France, and lives in a cave.

programme.title: Big things to come
programme.desc: Alex Johnson spent a decade trying to climb The Swarm, USA. The challenge forces her to face her true self.
